thread.title: Ginnifer Goodwin & Josh Dallas Are One Hot Couple at Oscars 2017!
thread.title_full: Ginnifer Goodwin & Josh Dallas Are One Hot Couple at Oscars 2017!

author: Just Jared
title: Ginnifer Goodwin & Josh Dallas Are One Hot Couple at Oscars 2017!
text:
Josh Dallas and Ginnifer Goodwin are one attractive couple!
The pair walked the red carpet together at the 2017 Academy Awards held at the Dolby Theatre on Sunday (February 26) in Hollywood. They star on the ABC show Once Upon a Time together.
Also seen on the red carpet was another ABC star – Scandal ‘s Darby Stanchfield !
Make sure to tune in for the Oscars, hosted by Jimmy Kimmel , TONIGHT at 8:30pm ET/5:30pm PT on ABC!
FYI: Ginnifer is wearing Zuhair Murad . Darby is wearing a Georges Chakra dress, Jimmy Choo shoes, Neil Lane jewels, and Rubeus Milano clutch.
